findings.title: Owner can lock/unlock mint
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to lock or unlock mint functionality.

findings.title: Owner can change _baseUri
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the _baseUri variable.

findings.title: Owner can create device
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to create a new device.

findings.title: Owner can change device name, price and add device to inventory
findings.description: The owner has excessive privileges to modify device details and manage inventory.

findings.title: Owner can blacklist addresses
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the privilege to blacklist addresses.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw tokens and BNBs
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to withdraw tokens and BNBs.

findings.title: Owner can change treasury address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the treasury address.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw tokens and BNBs
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to withdraw tokens and BNBs without any restrictions.

findings.title: Owner can mint
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to mint tokens.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw tokens and BNBs
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to withdraw tokens and BNBs without any restrictions.

findings.title: Owner can change price
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the price of a device or token.

findings.title: Owner can pause/unpause
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to pause or unpause the contract.
